pages.text: The spirit crystal staff itself does not carry any spells, and the spells will be released automatically after it's fully charged, and a Molding Spell can be equipped. You can craft a spirit crystal staff by combining a Molding Spell and a spirit crystal staff at a workbench. A spirit crystal staff with a Molding Spell can be used as a crafting ingredient to extract the Molding Spell.
Crafted at the Magick Synthesis Matrix.
